SELECT CODE_GRP, CODE, NAME, CODE2, NAME2, CODE3, NAME3, CODE4, NAME4, CODE5, NAME5, SEQ, UZ_YN FROM HMFB_006
AND UZ_YN = 'Y'
AND LOWER(CODE_GRP) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{codeGrp},'%')
AND LOWER(CODE) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{code},'%')
AND NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY CODE_GRP, SEQ LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(CODE_GRP||CODE) FROM HMFB_006
AND UZ_YN = 'Y'
AND LOWER(CODE_GRP) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{codeGrp},'%')
AND LOWER(CODE) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{code},'%')
AND NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
